title: Aaron Donald Swinging Helmets?
description:
A fracas breaks out at Rams/Bengals joint practice, and the most dangerous man in the sport somehow comes away wielding a helmet in each hand -- miraculously nobody got un-alived... but will the league step in? Plus, what does the Pat Beverley deal mean for Russell Westbrook, what's up with Drake's new hair, and a "Don't get fired" topic that we literally had to bail out of, and go to commercial. All that and more, on Jalen & Jacoby.
